item.title: Status Update
item.description: A Quick Status Update I know it’s been a long time since my last blog post aimed at providing Java users with an up-to-date guide on building GraphQL API’s with SpringBoot (if you missed it check it out here - shameless plug :) ). Anyway, this is just a quick status update to say that I’m still alive! Work has been hectic recently as I’ve been asked to undertake a rather large project.
